title: Easy Math
text:
Zoro isa student of a primary school. He likes to solve mathematical problem. One day he tries to solve a math, but he is unable to solve the problem efficiently because of being a student of primary school. As you are a programmer he wants your help to solve this problem. The problem is to find the sum of some consecutive numbers.Example, if the first number is 2 and the last number is 5, then the result would be2 + 3 + 4 + 5 = 14InputEvery line contains two integers a and b. Input is terminated by theend of file.OutputOutput the sum the of all numbers between a and b (inclusively).Constraints-108≤ (a , b) ≤ 108ExampleInput:2 5
5 10Output:14
45
